access_closes_date.description:
Date when the course closes. After this date enrolled students may no longer view and interact with the restricted course content.
					If blank the course is open indefinitely after the the access_opens_date has passed.
					Does not affect course enrollment, see enrollment_opens_date to control the course enrollment close date.
					Format: Y-m-d H:i:s.

access_closes_message.default: This course closed on [lifterlms_course_info id="{{course_id}}" key="end_date"].
access_closes_message.description: Message displayed to enrolled students when the course is accessed after the access_closes_date has passed.

raw.description: Raw message content.

rendered.description: Rendered message content.

access_opens_date.description:
Date when the course opens, allowing enrolled students to begin to view and interact with the restricted course content.
					If blank the course is open until after the access_closes_date has passed.
					Does not affect course enrollment, see enrollment_opens_date to control the course enrollment start date.
					Format: Y-m-d H:i:s.

access_opens_message.default: This course opens on [lifterlms_course_info id="{{course_id}}" key="start_date"].
access_opens_message.description: Message displayed to enrolled students when the course is accessed before the access_opens_date has passed.

rendered.description: Rendered message content.

enrollment_closes_date.description:
Date when the course enrollment closes.
					If blank course enrollment is open indefinitely after the the enrollment_opens_date has passed.
					Does not affect course content access, see access_opens_date to control course access close date.
					Format: Y-m-d H:i:s.

enrollment_closes_message.default: Enrollment in this course closed on [lifterlms_course_info id="{{course_id}}" key="enrollment_end_date"].

sales_page_type.description:
Determines the type of sales page content to display.
- none displays the course content.
- content displays alternate content from the excerpt property.
- page redirects to the WordPress page defined in content_page_id.
- url redirects to the URL defined in content_page_url

sales_page_url.description: The URL of the sales page content. Required when content_type equals url. Only returned when the content_type equals url.

parent_id.description: WordPress post ID of the parent item. Must be a Section ID. 0 indicates an "orphaned" lesson which can be edited and viewed by instructors and admins but cannot be read by students.

order.description: Order of the lesson within its immediate parent.

prerequisite.description: Lesson ID of the prerequisite lesson.

points.description: Determines the weight of the lesson when grading the course.

audio_embed.description: URL to an oEmbed enable audio URL.

video_embed.description: URL to an oEmbed enable video URL.

drip_date.description: The date and time when the lesson becomes available. Applicable only when drip_method is date. Format: Y-m-d H:i:s.

drip_days.description: Number of days to wait before allowing access to the lesson. Applicable only when drip_method is enrollment, start, or prerequisite.

drip_method.description:
Determine the method with which to make the lesson content available.
  • none: Drip is disabled; the lesson is immediately available.
  • date: Lesson is made available at a specific date and time.
  • enrollment: Lesson is made available a specific number of days after enrollment into the course.
  • start: Lesson is made available a specific number of days after the course's start date. Only available on courses with a access_opens_date.
  • prerequisite: Lesson is made available a specific number of days after the prerequisite lesson is completed.

public.description: Denotes a lesson that's publicly accessible regardless of course enrollment.

quiz.description: Associate a quiz with this lesson.

enabled.description: Determines if a quiz is enabled for the lesson.

id.description: The post ID of the associated quiz.

progression.description:
Determines lesson progression requirements related to the quiz.
  • complete: The quiz must be completed (with any grade) to progress the lesson.
  • pass: A passing grade must be earned to progress the lesson.

auto_enroll.description: List of courses to automatically enroll students into when they're enrolled into the membership.

catalog_visibility.description: Visibility of the membership in catalogs and search results.

instructors.description: List of post instructors. Defaults to current user when creating a new post.

restriction_action.description: Determines the action to take when content restricted by the membership is accessed by a non-member. - `none`: Remain on page and display the message `restriction_message`. - `membership`: Redirect to the membership's permalink. - `page`: Redirect to the permalink of the page identified by `restriction_page_id`. - `custom`: Redirect to the URL identified by `restriction_url`.

restriction_message.default: You must belong to the [lifterlms_membership_link id="{{membership_id}}"] membership to access this content.
restriction_message.description: Message to display to non-members after a `restriction_action` redirect. When `restriction_action` is `none` replaces the page content with this message.

raw.description: Raw message content.

rendered.description: Rendered message content.

restriction_page_id.description: WordPress page ID used for redirecting non-members when `restriction_action` is `page`.

restriction_url.description: URL used for redirecting non-members when `restriction_action` is `custom`.

sales_page_page_id.description: The WordPress page ID of the sales page. Required when `sales_page_type` equals `page`. Only returned when the `sales_page_type` equals `page`.

sales_page_type.description: Defines alternate content displayed to visitors and non-enrolled students when accessing the post. - `none` displays the post content. - `content` displays alternate content from the `excerpt` property. - `page` redirects to the WordPress page defined in `content_page_id`. - `url` redirects to the URL defined in `content_page_url`.

sales_page_url.description: The URL of the sales page content. Required when `sales_page_type` equals `url`. Only returned when the `sales_page_type` equals `url`.

access_expiration.description: Access expiration type. `lifetime` provides access until cancelled or until a recurring payment fails. `limited-period` provides access for a limited period as specified by `access_length` and `access_period` `limited-date` provides access until the date specified by access_expires_date`.

access_expires.description: Date when access expires. Only applicable when `access_expiration` is `limited-date`. `Format: Y-m-d H:i:s`.

access_length.description: Determine the length of access from time of purchase. Only applicable when `access_expiration` is `limited-period`.

access_period.description: Determine the length of access from time of purchase. Only applicable when `access_expiration` is `limited-period`

availability_restrictions.description: Restrict usage of this access plan to students enrolled in at least one of the specified memberships.

frequency.description: Billing frequency [0-6]. `0` denotes a one-time payment. `>= 1` denotes a recurring plan.

length.description: For recurring plans only. Determines the number of intervals a plan should run for. `0` denotes the plan should run until cancelled.

period.description: For recurring plans only. Determines the interval of recurring payments.

post_id.description: Determines the course or membership which can be accessed through the plan.

redirect_forced.description: Use this plans's redirect settings when purchasing a Membership this plan is restricted to. Applicable only when `availability_restrictions` exist for the plan

redirect_page.description: WordPress page ID to use for checkout success redirection. Applicable only when `redirect_type` is page.

redirect_type.description: Determines the redirection behavior of the user's browser upon successful checkout or registration through the plan. `self`: Redirect to the permalink of the specified `post_id`. `page`: Redirect to the permalink of the WordPress page specified by `redirect_page_id`. `url`: Redirect to the URL specified by `redirect_url`.

redirect_url.description: URL to use for checkout success redirection. Applicable only when `redirect_type` is `url`.

sale_date_end.description: Used to automatically end a scheduled sale. If empty, the plan remains on sale indefinitely. Only applies when `sale_enabled` is `true`. Format: `Y-m-d H:i:s`.

sale_date_start.description: Used to automatically start a scheduled sale. If empty, the plan is on sale immediately. Only applies when `sale_enabled` is `true`. Format: `Y-m-d H:i:s`.

sale_enabled.description: Mark the plan as "On Sale" allowing for temporary price adjustments.

sale_price.description: Sale price. Only applies when `sale_enabled` is `true`.

trial_enabled.description: Enable a trial period for a recurring access plan.

trial_length.description: Determines the length of trial access. Only applies when `trial_enabled` is `true`.

trial_period.description: Determines the length of trial access. Only applies when `trial_enabled` is `true`.

trial_price.description: Determines the price of the trial period. Only applies when `trial_enabled` is `true`.
